mapper.select: select c.info as optionInfo, c.price as price, c.stock as stock, d.name as categoryName, b.type as type, b.name as name, b.explanation as explanation, b.reg_date as regDate, a.num as num, a.price as priceSum from cart a join product b on a.product_no=b.no join product_option c on b.option_no=c.no join category d on b.category_no=d.no where a.member_no = #{value}
mapper.insert: insert into cart(member_no, product_no, num, price) values(#{memberNo }, #{productNo}, #{num }, #{price })
mapper.delete: delete from category where member_no=#{memberNo } and product_no=#{productNo }
